title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper
steps:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions
2. While pasta cooks, cut pancetta into small cubes and fry until crispy
3. In a bowl, whisk eggs with grated Parmesan and plenty of black pepper
4. When pasta is cooked, reserve 1 cup of pasta water and drain
5. Working quickly, toss hot pasta with pancetta, then remove from heat
6. Add egg mixture and toss vigorously, adding pasta water as needed
7. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper

title: Fluffy Pancakes
description: Light and fluffy pancakes perfect for a lazy weekend breakfast
steps:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt
2. In another bowl, beat the egg and mix with milk, melted butter, and vanilla
3. Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until just combined (lumps are okay!)
4. Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat
5. Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake
6. Cook until bubbles form on surface and edges look set, about 2-3 minutes
7. Flip and cook another 1-2 minutes until golden brown
8. Serve with maple syrup, fresh berries, or your favorite toppings

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Decadent individual chocolate cakes with a molten center
steps:
1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C) and grease 4 ramekins
2. Melt chocolate and butter together in a double boiler or microwave
3. In a bowl, whisk eggs and sugar until light and fluffy
4. Fold in the melted chocolate mixture
5. Sift in flour and cocoa powder, fold gently until combined
6. Divide batter among prepared ramekins
7. Bake for exactly 12-14 minutes until edges are firm but center is soft
8. Let rest for 1 minute, then invert onto plates
9. Serve immediately with vanilla ice cream or whipped cream

title: Fresh Garden Salad
description: A crisp, refreshing salad with homemade vinaigrette
steps:
1. Wash and dry all vegetables thoroughly
2. Slice cucumber into half-moons
3. Halve the cherry tomatoes
4. Thinly slice the red onion
5. For the dressing: whisk olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and Dijon mustard
6. Season dressing with salt and pepper to taste
7. Toss greens with vegetables in a large bowl
8. Drizzle with dressing just before serving

title: Creamy Tomato Soup
description: A comforting, velvety tomato soup perfect for cold days
steps:
1. Dice the onion and mince the garlic
2. Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat
3. Sauté onion until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes
4. Add garlic and cook for 1 more minute
5. Add canned tomatoes and vegetable broth
6. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes
7. Remove from heat and blend until smooth
8. Stir in heavy cream and fresh basil
9. Season with salt and pepper to taste
10. Serve hot with crusty bread

title: Avocado Toast
description: Simple yet delicious avocado toast with various toppings
steps:
1. Toast the sourdough bread until golden and crispy
2. Cut avocado in half, remove pit, and scoop flesh into a bowl
3. Add lime juice and mash with a fork to desired consistency
4. Season with salt and red pepper flakes
5. Spread avocado mixture on toast
6. Top with halved cherry tomatoes
7. Add optional toppings like a poached egg or microgreens
